headline.print_headline: Greece Will Not Need Third Bailout, PM Samaras Tells Paper
headline.main: Greece Will Not Need Third Bailout, PM Samaras Tells Paper

docs.snippet: Greece is beating its fiscal targets and will not need a third bailout from its international creditors, Prime Minister Antonis Samaras told Sunday's Realnews newspaper, confident that the country's debt will soon be deemed viable....
docs.lead_paragraph: Greece is beating its fiscal targets and will not need a third bailout from its international creditors, Prime Minister Antonis Samaras told Sunday's Realnews newspaper, confident that the country's debt will soon be deemed viable.

headline.print_headline: It's Not Normal, Says Mourinho of Costa's Exploits
headline.main: It's Not Normal, Says Mourinho of Costa's Exploits

docs.snippet: Diego Costa left the Stamford Bridge pitch to exultant cheers after a hat-trick against Swansea City on Saturday highlighted a breathless start to a Chelsea career for a team that has been designed around him....
docs.lead_paragraph: Diego Costa left the Stamford Bridge pitch to exultant cheers after a hat-trick against Swansea City on Saturday highlighted a breathless start to a Chelsea career for a team that has been designed around him.

headline.print_headline: Hawks Apologize for Racially Charged Comments
headline.main: Hawks Apologize for Racially Charged Comments

docs.snippet: The Atlanta Hawks released an open letter of apology to fans and city of Atlanta on Saturday, saying the organization "did not do the right thing" to correct racially inflammatory words and innuendos "over a period of years."...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Atlanta Hawks released an open letter of apology to fans and city of Atlanta on Saturday, saying the organization "did not do the right thing" to correct racially inflammatory words and innuendos "over a period of years."

headline.print_headline: Teen Badly Injured in 40-Foot Fall From Cliffs
headline.main: Teen Badly Injured in 40-Foot Fall From Cliffs

docs.snippet: Portland Fire and Rescue says a girl in her early teens sustained life-threatening injuries when she fell more than 40 feet off the cliffs at a popular hiking and climbing spot....
docs.lead_paragraph: Portland Fire and Rescue says a girl in her early teens sustained life-threatening injuries when she fell more than 40 feet off the cliffs at a popular hiking and climbing spot.

headline.sub: With drums and flutes, loyalists march in Scotland to keep United Kingdom intact

headline.print_headline: Killer Instinct Deserts Welbeck on Arsenal Debut
headline.main: Killer Instinct Deserts Welbeck on Arsenal Debut

docs.snippet: Louis van Gaal probably uttered a rueful 'I told you so' after one costly miss defined Danny Welbeck's Arsenal debut against Manchester City in a match that will be remembered for the quality of finishing on show....
